img_text: VAN DYKE TRIAL DAY 1 #NEWS2KNOW 1. Judge Vincent Gaughan denied a change of venue. 2. In an opening statement, Van Dyke's attorney said "race had nothing to do" with Laquan McDonald's death. 3. The first officer on scene, Joseph McElligott, said he ordered McDonald to drop the knife "maybe 30 times." 4. Jurors were shown the video of Van Dyke shooting McDonald. 5. Another officer, Dora Fontaine, said McDonald was swinging a knife, but was otherwise not threatening.
